none: 香川県金刀比羅宮の算額 (復元)・Sangaku of Kotohira Shrine, Kagawa (Replica)
香川県仲多度郡琴平町892-1・892-1 Kotohira-cho, Nakatado-gun, Kagawa Prefecture
内田恭門人・Yasumon Uchida's disciples

昭和51年(1976)11月　本田益夫　復元奉納
原文は古今算鑑（天保3）に編載・Restored and dedicated by Honda Masuo November 1976. The original text is included in the Kokin Sankan (Tenpo 3).
[所有者様]には、算額の撮影の許可を賜り、感謝申し上げます。・We would like to thank [the owner] for giving us permission to photograph the mathematical tablet.
算額は一般に公開されていません。・The sangaku is generally not publicly accessible.
